"The Hidden Fee Free Zone"

We've rented studios where the final bill looks nothing like the booking price. At Studio 404, the rate you see is the rate you pay. Lighting, grip, and amenities are standard, not upgrades.

Common Questions

We understand creative flow. If there isn't a booking immediately following yours, you can extend your session at the standard hourly rate. However, to respect all creators, unapproved overages are billed at 3x the hourly rate.
